bug.description:
Describe the bug Thread ID can be obsolete when it's referenced. To Reproduce Steps to reproduce the behavior:
Go to '...' Click on '....' Scroll down to '....' See error

OS: [e.g. macOS] Python: [e.g. 3.7] Harvester: [e.g. 0.2.12] GenTL Producer: [e.g. Comapny ABC] Camera: [e.g. Company DEF]
